XXsabhivpu:svp_168_1: yat saṃbuddho bhavān khyāta etad ādeṣṭum arhati //
XXsabhivpu:svp_169_1: bhagavān sabhikaṃ drṣṭvā tad uttaram upādiśat //
XXsabhivpu:svp_171_1: nirmada uttaraṃ vijñaṃ papraccha sāñjaliḥ smitaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_174_1: saṃbodhayati yaḥ sarvaṃ sa saṃbuddho nigadyate //
XXsabhivpu:svp_176_1: saddharmaśrāvakaḥ saṃghaḥ sa yogī yatir ucyate //
XXsabhivpu:svp_179_0: ity uttareṇa saṃdiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa sabhikaḥ punaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_179_1: sāścarya uttaraṃ vijñaṃ praṇatvā ca nyavedayat //
XXsabhivpu:svp_180_0: uttarabrāhmaṇāḥ ke ca snātakāś ca kathaṃ dvijāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_180_1: vaidikāś ca kathaṃ viprāḥ śrotriyāś cāpi te kathaṃ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_181_0: kṣetrajñāś ca kathaṃ te 'pi kathaṃ ca brahmacārinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_181_1: ṛṣayaś ca parivrājā munayaś ca tapasvinaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_182_0: yatayo yoginaś cāpi kathaṃ kenāpi karmataḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_182_1: etat karma samākhyāya saṃbodhayatu me manaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_183_1: taṃ sabhikaṃ samālokya vihasann evam ādiśat //
XXsabhivpu:svp__184a__0: sādhu śṛṇu samādhāya yad etat praṣṭum icchasi /
XXsabhivpu:svp__184a__1: tat te mano'bhituṣṭaye vakṣyāmy ahaṃ samāsataḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp__184b__0: yo viśvaṃ sṛjati brahmā svayaṃbhūr vedabhṛd vidhiḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_186_0: snātvā tīrtheṣu nityaṃ ye śuddhaśīlā jitendriyāḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_186_1: brahmavrataṃ carantas te niṣkāṃkṣāḥ snātakāḥ smṛtāḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_187_1: brahmacaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā carante te dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_189_0: ye brahmasaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā saṃcarantaḥ sadā śubhe /
XXsabhivpu:svp_189_1: sadvidheḥ pūrayanty arthaṃ te viprāḥ kathitā budhaiḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_191_0: sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ yat kṣetram ātmā samāśrayet /
XXsabhivpu:svp_191_1: tadviśuddhiṃ vijānīte sa tu kṣetrajña ucyate //
XXsabhivpu:svp_200_0: etat svalpatarārthe 'pi kathaṃ na jñāyate tvayā /
XXsabhivpu:svp_201_0: mānaṃ tyaja tvaṃ sabhika bhajainaṃ śāstrapāragaṃ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_205_1: kā kathā cara tasmāt tvaṃ śāsane 'sya susaṃvaraṃ //
XXsabhivpu:svp__206__0: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_207_1: taṃ munīndraṃ mudā natvā sāñjalir evam abravīt //
XXsabhivpu:svp_209_0: tvam eva bhagavān nāthaḥ sarvadharmādhipo jinaḥ /
XXsabhivpu:svp_211_1: yad ahaṃ bhagavan pātuṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ samutsahe //
XXsabhivpu:svp_212_0: tad bhavān māṃ samālokya samanvāhartum arhati /
XXsabhivpu:svp_214_1: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa karuṇāmbudhiḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_215_1: ehi bhadrāsti te vāṃcchā saugate saṃvare yadi //
XXsabhivpu:svp_216_1: ity ādiśya sa saṃbuddho dakṣiṇapāṇinā svayaṃ //
XXsabhivpu:svp_217_1: bhagavatā śiraḥ spṛṣṭe muṇḍitaḥ sa jitendriyaḥ //
XXsabhivpu:svp__219__0: etad dṛṣṭvā samākarṇya sarve lokādhipā api /
XXsabhivpu:svp__22o__0: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
